dublin_core.dcvalue: Sara Chaimberlain Head of Information Communications Technology India at BBC Media Action gave this presentation at the March 12 meeting of the mHealth Working Group This presentation covers barriers and approaches to achieving sustainable scale of Ananya an mHealth education program in Bihar India
Made available in DSpace on 2020-06-22T11:02:21Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 mhealth_at_scale_bbc_media_action_march_2014.pdf: 2116238 bytes, checksum: 0f2182b92400fcbde3e8d9938069e3f7 (MD5)
mHealth at Scale: BBC Media Action's Programme Ananya in Bihar, India
